item.title: My Personal vMotion
item.description: Every once in a while an opportunity presents itself that is just too good to pass up and after 8 years at Seatrans AS I’ve decided to move on and and accept a position as a Senior Consultant in the Infrastructure Consulting division of EDB ErgoGroup. Seatrans has been a fantastic employer, and without the backing and support I’ve had over the years I would not be in a position where this change would be possible.
